website_summaries.verdict: An effective spray for wasps that continues working after you spray.
pros: Sprays up to 20 feet and kills wasps quickly
Also prevents wasps and hornets from returning for up to 4 weeks
Easily kills entire nests of wasps
cons: A little pricier than other wasp sprays

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer, seriously?!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff from a chemical perspective; knocks wasps down very quickly and has a good range. That being said, Spectracide should fire the person who designed the sprayer on these cans and re-design them. The sprayer apparatus is absolute garbage; half the output ends up running down the side of the can while you spray, so not only is quite a bit wasted, it may drip where you don't want it, and you certainly don't want it on your skin. So, wear gloves when using if it's a pre-planned use, or perhaps keep a chemical resistant rubber gloves rubber-banded to the can so you have one handy in a time of quick need.
customer_reviews.author: Interwebz Admin

customer_reviews.title: It kills!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most effective spray I have ever used on wasps. Have tried all options that I could find at Walmart, Home Deposit, etc including Raid and none seemed to work that well or at all. This spray is powerful and shoots a thick spray for 12-15 feet. Kills 95+% on contact. Drops them right out of the air. Used without gloves or eye protection. No issues. There is a smell of poison when done that lingers for a short while. Sprayed on flowers...which was NOT good for the flowers, but no more wasps. Have wiped out two large nests with less than 2 cans. Have 10 cans unused. This is great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wasp spray
customer_reviews.text: I am highly sensitive to red wasp stings. This gives the fastest knock-down of anything I have tried. The UPS delivery guy, Mike, was surprised I bought a box at a time, but I live in the country and am continually vigilant for red wasps around the place. Fit perfectly at the end of the Wasp Wand which I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bill peters

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates wasps and hornets on contact
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Eliminates wasps and hornets on contact. Sprays over 15 feet. Just make sure which way the wind is blowing to avoid getting it in the face or on your skin. I wear safety glasses when spraying to be safe. It took care of several hornet and wasp nest's that were active around my deck.
customer_reviews.author: gar

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff. Use on all insects. For ants in drive way and walk way cracks, it's like hunting hummingbirds with a bazooka, but, they don't come back where you treat them. I buy it by the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I am no expert on these products, but this stuff really works. Two short bursts and the nest is dead. I can wipe out several wasp nests with one can, unlike the garbage they sell in the local stores where I live, which can take out one nest on a good day if you spray the entire contents. As an experiment, I sprayed an ant nest in my driveway before work. I returned two days later and no more ants. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: groundhog

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stuff that never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: This makes me wonder how/why other wasp sprays even exist. A comparison from my observation, 1 or 2 sprays of this stuff would be equivalent to 4 to 6 sprays of anything available at a local home and garden store. For me, I purchase a few cans at the beginning of the season and it lasts. This gives me reason enough to only buy this brand. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good but not as great as other reviewers reported
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good but not as great as other reviewers reported. They do die but after a minute or so. They can still get you if you're not careful. Oh, and if you get this on your flowers they may suffer like mine did!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best spray for wasps that I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite spray. It’s clear, it doesn’t foam, it doesn’t stain but it kills wasps immediately. Does exactly what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Can is awful
customer_reviews.text: The spray drips onto my hands when using it, directly from the tip of the can. The spray device has been defective in all of the 12 cans I purchased. It is very dangerous to get this on you, hence my bad review. The actual spray does a good job killing wasps quickly. When I first bought the product 4 years ago, this problem did not happen.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: The best Hornet Spray I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is THE BEST HORNET WASP KILLER on the market. Kills in seconds and keeps killing for weeks. Areas I have sprayed remained neat free for over 4 weeks after spraying the area. And it literally kills in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: PatD

customer_reviews.title: Hornets are gone.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. Didn't even have to go near the hornets to spray them. They just dropped like flies the minute you sprayed them. Love the stuff. You will not be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Rosato

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Florida has an abundance of wasps all year long. Very Happy to be able to find this product. It kills these insects most of the time with one shot. Not only do I use this at home but carry it with me in my work truck. Thank you for making this product available.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered on time, and as seller described. Excellent price for 12 cans. Cutting wood that has laid for several months and wasp built nest which became a hazard to my husband who is allergic to bees. This works fantastic. Even knocks them down in midair.
customer_reviews.author: Operations Assistant

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cans were out of date, if I would have realized this when first purchased, I would have returned them. Generally this product works well, but these cans did not. The wasps just flew off when sprayed. Would not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Wasp Killer
customer_reviews.text: We use this stuff at work. We always have lots of wasps in our line of work so we need the best wasp spray and this works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Like The Stuff They Made 30 Years Ago √√
customer_reviews.text: Working great for me. Direct hit on wasps and they drop straight to the ground and are quickly dead. Wish I found this stuff years ago !!
customer_reviews.author: BatterySquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Kills hornets & bees dead
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works better than anything else I've tried. Death is instant. What more can you ask of a bug killer?
customer_reviews.author: Webfarmer

customer_reviews.title: Effect lasts longer than most.
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to wasps. 911 calls etc. This spray really keeps them away. Doesn't kill as quickly as some, but the trade-off is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Wasp and hornet spray
customer_reviews.text: This stuff does the job, the wasps drop dead, and if others return to the nest they die also. GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Les. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't debilitate instantly.
customer_reviews.text: Wasps still fly around after being sprayed. A foam spray is probably a better purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R O'FARRELL

customer_reviews.title: Swear by this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for many years. Only product I have used that kills ON CONACT, & won't electrocute you if spraying around electrical anything! Contractors at work keep us ordering more & more of this product every year.. can't keep up with demand. More expensive than other brands, but so extremely worth it. Try it one time...you won't ever use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mc

customer_reviews.title: Yellow-Jackets
customer_reviews.text: we have some very tough yellow jackets in Timber lakes Utah. even when sprayed directly, it does not knock them down immediately. do not know what to use next.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product...best on the market. Shoots far and last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Delayed happiness - works well
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first that it didn't kill on contact... So when they flew away I was sad. Then I found the complete carnage in the attic that looked like a civil war battlefield with bodies everywhere. Wasps may have won three battles (aka stung me), but I've won the war baby. Sorry for the lady bug casualties, but don't be hanging out with the enemy...
customer_reviews.author: The dude

customer_reviews.title: Does not go 20 feet for me
customer_reviews.text: Our fresh can barely made 10 feet and at that point is just a bit of foam that seems to annoy the yellowjackets more than anything. I was able to hit a different nest much closer to the ground and it most certainly killed what it hit. Just disappointed because I bought the stuff to take out a large nest under a gutter on a second storey. I'll keep this can around for the rest of the season for easier to hit nests but I'll be looking for something different next year.
customer_reviews.author: jah72

product_meta.title: SpectracidePRO Wasp& Hornet Killer 18oz (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Pack of 12Spectracide PRO Wasp and Hornet Killer Aerosol is designed to kill wasps, hornets and yellow jackets and eliminate their nests. It provides an effective solution to eliminating dangerous stinging insects from a safe distance with a jet spray that reaches nests up to 20 ft. away. It kills the entire nest and keeps on killing returning insects for up to 4 weeks. Spectracide PRO Wasp and Hornet Killer Aerosol has a dielectric breakdown voltage of 47,300 volts making it safe to use near electrical panels. For nests: 1. Apply at sunrise or sunset when nests are least active. 2. Stand a safe distance from the nest. Don’t stand directly underneath. 3. Shake can well before each use. Aim spray away from person. Push button to spray. 4. Spray the nest until soaked. This product’s powerful spray will also kill insects that return to the nest. 5. Wait at least 24 hours before removing the nest. To kill wasps, hornets and yellow jackets: 1. Spray one to two seconds, until surface is moist, to kill wasps, hornets and yellow jackets under eaves and around screens, windows, doors, patios, cracks, holes and crevices or wherever else insects are noticed. 2. To prevent insects from entering the home, spray around areas where insets enter, such as outdoor plumbing, faucets, etc. and cracks or crevices in foundations as well as along sills and ledges. Use Tip: Avoid spraying vegetation directly.
feature_bullets: APPLICATION - Perfect décor addition to any wall for a living room, bedroom, bathroom, kids room, kitchen, office, hotel, dining room, bar etc.
FAST KNOCKDOWN: Kills wasps, hornets, yellow jackets and mud daubers
JET SPRAY: This product reaches nests up to 20 feet away
ELIMINATES THE NEST: SpectracidePRO Wasp & Hornet Killer kills the entire nest and kills returning wasps and hornets for up to 4 weeks
OUTDOOR USE ONLY: Dielectric breakdown voltage of 47,300 volts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars67 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
